item.title: High On Life now available for Switch 2
item.content:encoded:
• Switch 2

A free upgrade from the Switch version.

Squanch Games has released a Nintendo Switch 2 Edition of first-person shooter High On Life via Nintendo eShop for $39.99, the developer announced. Users who own High On Life for Switch can upgrade to the Switch 2 version via a free Upgrade Pack.

High On Life first launched for Xbox Series, Xbox One, and PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and Microsoft Store December 13, 2022, followed by PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 on July 22, 2023, and Switch on May 6, 2025.

The Nintendo Switch 2 Edition adds the following features:

  • Support for Joy-Con 2 mouse controls
  • Improved VFX quality
  • Upgraded texture quality
  • Higher frame rate
  • Enhanced resolution
  • Up to 1080p resolution at 30 frames per second gameplay when docked

Here is a brief overview of the game, via Squanch Games:

Fresh out of high school with no job and no ambition, you’ve really got nothing going for you until an alien cartel that wants to get high off humanity invades Earth. Now, you and a team of charismatic talking guns must answer the hero’s call and become the deadliest intergalactic bounty hunter the cosmos has ever seen.

Travel to a variety of biomes and locations across the cosmos, go up against the nefarious Garmantuous and his gang of goons, collect loot, meet unique characters, and more, in the latest comedy adventure from Squanch Games!

item.title: Lost Soul Aside demo launches August 29
item.content:encoded:
• PS5

Available now some regions.

Publisher Sony Interactive Entertainment and developer Ultizero Games will release a demo for single-player action adventure RPG Lost Soul Aside for PlayStation 5 via PlayStation Store alongside the game’s launch on August 28. It is available now in regions where it is already August 28, such as Australia, New Zealand, and Japan.

Here is an overview of the demo, via PlayStation Store:

Trial by Combat

Test your skill, courage, and steel in the first step of a hero’s journey in the action-heavy Lost Soul Aside demo.

Prepare Kaser for brutal challenges to save humanity, with two epic boss battles.

Chain skilful sword combos in a deadly duel with the Rose Queen—a legendary warrior unleashing flurries of rapid strikes and dazzling slashes.

Wield potent Arena Powers and a two-handed greatsword to face the Empire’s formidable champion, Holy Knight Commander Victor, and the immense Ancient Mecha construct in a ferocious clash for the ages.

Can you survive? Are you ready for your epic odyssey in Lost Soul Aside?

Please note: your save data will not carry over to the full game.

It is currently unclear whether the demo will be made available for PC.

Lost Soul Aside is due out for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on August 29.
